cunning_eyes.name: Cunning Eyes
cunning_eyes.desc: When you see a weak point of the enemy, increase damage when attacking that weak point.

blood_cloak.name: Blood Cloak
blood_cloak.desc: When you have one hp left, increase damage and become invincible for 1 second every 10 seconds.

poison_apple.name: Poison Apple
poison_apple.desc: When you eat this apple, you will be poisoned for 10 seconds.

brag_bracelet.name: Brag Bracelet
brag_bracelet.desc: When you use this bracelet, you will brag about your damage for 10 seconds.
